title: Green coconut chutney
description: This beautiful fresh green chutney is fragrant and cooling with hot curries - and can be made in seconds!

default: 250g/9oz fresh grated coconut or frozen coconut, thawed

steps: Put all the ingredients into a blender and whiz until you have got a thick paste, adding a little water if necessary.
Taste and adjust the seasoning, adding more lime juice if you like.
